document.heading: Deed Recordation Tax and Related Amendments Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-176, the “Deed Recordation Tax and Related Amendments Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-462, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 6, 2004, and May 4, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 21, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-426 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-176 became effective on September 8, 2004.
